title: In Pavlov experiment, dog salivation was

content.question: In experiments in classical conditioning, the dog's salivation to food and a tone was considered which of the following?

choices.label: both an unconditioned and a conditioned stimulus
both an unconditioned and a conditioned response

content.answer: both an unconditioned and a conditioned response

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
